transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Haan boliye Vishal ji.
Customer: Ji ji aapne bheja tha sir mujhe abhi fir se wo screenshot ke not relevant lead hai wo maine dikhaya hai maine likhaya hai not relevant aa rahi hai lead hi nahi aa rahi hai matlab.
Executive: Aur jo ye short listed hai ye matlab sabki thi aapne sabki thi short listed aakhiri baar.
Customer: Samajh mein nahi aaya kya kar rahe ho.
Customer: Haan main puch raha hu jo short list aapne di thi wo last time kab ki thi ye wali aaj ki thi hai ya kal kal parso di thi.
Executive: Nahi maine to pehle kari thi abhi to kuch nahi kari.
Customer: Achcha abhi kuch nahi aa raha hai theek hai manually search karke dekh leta hu main ek baar aapke help ke liye.
Executive: Kar lijiye kar lijiye koi dikkat nahi hai baki iska solution nikal.
Customer: Na keval ek hi nazar aa raha hai wo 30 gram ka premium hai iske alawa kuch nazar nahi aa raha hai bas baki sab jab tak jab tak dikhega nahi jab tak dikhega nahi.
Customer: Aur jo trade.indiamart.com pe jaake manually search waha bhi nahi dikh raha hai waha bhi nahi dikhne ka karan yahi hai ki matlab ye kya hai ki isme kahi na kahi koi problem aayi hai tab jaake gadbad hua hai mamla aur kab aayi hai problem wo maine bataya tha aapko ki ek baar main isme naam mein changes kar raha tha to ye automatically deactivate ho gaye the product.
Customer: Waha se isko wapas active karwaye tab se problem hai ye usse pehle nahi tha to usse pehle theek tha.
Executive: Ek baar main aur power ki dekhta hu sir to aapki lead matlab generate ho rahi hai IndiaMART se hmm herbal joint pain relief ki generate ho rahi hai.
Customer: Wo hai hi nahi apne paas sahi nahi uski kya matlab hai.
Customer: To us product ko deactivate kar do fir aap hata do usko.
Executive: Haan wo product deactivate pada hai profile mein ya active hai.
Customer: Nahi active hai sare dekh liye maine.
Executive: Ek baar main aur power ki dekhta hu.
Customer: Aapne kya kiya tha waise aapne deactivate karke active kiya tha product dobara hai na.
Executive: Us samay wo deactivate ho gaye the haan theek hai naam change kar raha tha main usme kuch naam change kiya to wo automatic hi naam change to hua ki jaane nahi hua lekin wo deactivate ho gaya automatic hi to fir maine kya hai ki aap yaha par complaint register karwa ke usko active karwaye product ko active hone ke baad hi problem hui hai wo active hue ki nahi hue kya kami reh gayi waha pe aapke waha se wo hai baat samajh mein aa rahi hai baat mere yaha se nahi hai problem aapke waha se hai problem wo.
Customer: Fir to iske liye sir hame jo hamari backend team hai usko email dalna padega dobara se.
Executive: Mail dal dijiye taki kya problem hai bhai iska solution nikalo kyuki party disturb ho rahi hai yaha pe.
Customer: Ye problem se dikkat aa rahi hai aapko.
Executive: Are jyada din ho gaye mere ko deactivate kab hue the kab active karwaya maine tabhi se dekh lo aap lagbhag mahina bhar sa hi hota hai yaar to ab agar maan lo ek din nahi ho do din nahi ho lead to ek alag baat hai chalo theek hai bhai ek do din nahi aayi hogi par mahine tak nahi aaye aisa koi sambhav hai kya ye to sambhav hi nahi hai.
Customer: Usse pehle yahi shikayat thi waise aapki wo wali wo wali dur hogi thi usse pehle thi.
Executive: Kaun si wali shikayat.
Customer: Aapne bataya tha na usse pehle ke aapka category wala tha wo nahi ho paya tha.
Executive: Nahi hua nahi hua.
Customer: Theek hai isme main aapne isme jaake search kari thi sir jo maine aapko ek baar dikhaya tha manually search karne ke alawa category.
Executive: Haan wo dekh bhai haan dekh liya maine kuch bhi sambhav nahi hai mere yaha se to ab jo kuch hona hai wo aapke waha se hona hai yaha se sab kuch check kar chuka hu.
Customer: Theek hai to main last lead aapne kab consume kari thi ek baar check last jo consume kari thi wo to product nahi kari hogi na consume aapne aisa to nahi ki wo product nahi kari hogi waise last jo lead haan jo lead bachti hai na usko main faltu mein khapata hu khapani padti hai mujhe majburi mein jaise 6 November ko consume kari hai 1 November ko kari hai to 1 November se 6 November ke beech nahi aayi hai.
Executive: Are wo majburi mein karni padti hai mere ko nahi to aayi nahi rahi lead to kya kare chalo bach rahi hai kya kare kuch ulta seedha hi le le kya kare isko to dab lagaye lead ko to.
Customer: Sir ulta seedha consume mat karo warna pattern kharab ho jayega.
Executive: Kya karu to main batao aap jab aap mere ko support nahi kar rahe ho lead nahi de rahe ho aap mere ko to kya karunga main batao ye to aapki banti hai na.
Executive: Koshish to sir hum kar rahe hai aisa to nahi ki hum nahi chahte aapki aapki dikkat dur ho sir but agar dekho lead hi nahi dikh rahi hai ya relevant wala issue aa raha hai to iske liye fir ek baar main jo hamari backend team hai aap iska sudhar karwa dijiye fir main faltu lead nahi lunga bas theek hai na.
Customer: Theek hai theek hai main iske liye aage dalta hu sir isme aur ek cheez aur main isme aapka ticket open ho gaya tha kyuki aapne feedback diya tha ke not relevant lead aa rahi hai sir to hamare end se ticket open hai to hum ise matlab main aapka kaam kara raha hu ye wala jo aap bata rahe hai main aage dal raha hu ki not relevant lead dikh rahi hai taki backend team ispe ek baar dekhe baat kare kya concern hai to ye ticket close kar sakte hai na sir aapka mere bhi aapko jo karna hai aapko jo karna hai wo kariye aapka to main aap to mera problem solve karwa dijiye bas aapko jo karna hai kariye main main ticket kab bhejta hu sir jo ticket open hua hai kyuki agar aap aap usi ticket ke liye main bol raha hu aapko jo karna hai kar lijiye lekin mera problem solve karwa dijiye jaise bhi ho sakta hai karwa dijiye iske liye main puri koshish karunga sir but main ticket kab bhejta hu ticket band kar sakta hu aapka ye agar aap ticket band karne se aap mera problem solve karwa dete hai to kar dijiye.
Customer: Theek hai main ticket aapka yaha se close kar de raha hu aur dusra ye aapke paas ek wo jayega sir feedback mere regarding IndiaMART ke regarding wo feedback main tab dunga jab mera kaam ho jayega usse pehle nahi dunga theek hai theek hai to us pe aap not satisfied hi mat karna please abhi haan theek hai par mera ko santusht kar dena bas ji ji ji theek hai theek hai sir okay thank you okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Not receiving relevant buyleads.

- Products deactivated automatically.

- Category issue not resolved.



Resolution:

- Executive assured to escalate issue to backend team.

- Executive will send an email to backend team.

- Executive closed the ticket.



Next Steps: 

- Backend team will investigate the issue.

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, deactivation, category, backend team
